subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oh one more thing !!!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
He used to be until they had a falling out.

He's had a fairly successful solo career and came out with an album last 
year.  Good stuff!

Zack

On Wed, 13 Feb 2008, Ralph Smith wrote:

> Hi it's me again,
>
> Is John Fogerty the name of the lead singer of The Band " Creedence
> Clearwater Revival " ? I don't remember and I did hear a voice the
> next day after the Grammy Awards say the name "John Fogerty ". Thanks.
>
> Regards,
>
> Ralph
>
